titleStmt.title: Platoes cap Cast at this yeare 1604, being leape-yeere.
titleStmt.author: Evesdropper, Adam.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Purfoot] for Ieffrey Chorlton,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
